verses.verse: And <WG2532> It Came To Pass <WG1096> On <WG1722> One <WG1520> <WG3588> <WG2250>, Of Those Days, <WG1565> As Was Teaching <WG1321> He <WG846> The <WG3588> People <WG2992> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Temple <WG2411> And <WG2532> Announcing The Glad Tidings, <WG2097> Came Up <WG2186> The <WG3588> Chief Priests <WG749> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Scribes <WG1122> With <WG4862> The <WG3588> Elders, <WG4245>

<WG611> And Answering <WG1161> He Said <WG2036> To <WG4314> Them, <WG846> Will Ask <WG2065> You <WG5209> I Also <WG2504> One <WG1520> Thing, <WG3056> And <WG2532> Tell <WG2036> Me, <WG3427>
The <WG3588> Baptism <WG908> Of John <WG2491> From <WG1537> Heaven <WG3772> Was It <WG2258> Or <WG2228> From <WG1537> Men? <WG444>

<WG3588> And They <WG1161> Reasoned <WG4817> Among <WG4314> Themselves, <WG1438> <WG3004> Saying, <WG3754> If <WG1437> We Should Say <WG2036> From <WG1537> Heaven, <WG3772> He Will Say <WG2046> <WG1223> <WG5101> Then <WG3767> <WG3756> Did Ye Not Believe <WG4100> Him? <WG846>

<WG1437> But If <WG1161> We Should Say <WG2036> From <WG1537> Men, <WG444> All <WG3956> The <WG3588> People <WG2992> Will Stone <WG2642> Us; <WG2248> <WG3982> <WG1063> For They Are Persuaded That <WG2076> John <WG2491> A Prophet <WG4396> Was. <WG1511>
And <WG2532> <WG611> They Answered <WG3361> They Knew Not <WG1492> Whence. <WG4159>

<WG756> And He Began <WG1161> To <WG4314> The <WG3588> People <WG2992> To Speak <WG3004> <WG3588> <WG3850> This Parable : <WG3778> A Man <WG444> Certain <WG5100> Planted <WG5452> A Vineyard, <WG290> And <WG2532> Let Out <WG1554> It <WG846> To Husbandmen, <WG1092> And <WG2532> Left The Country <WG589> <WG5550> For A Long Time. <WG2425>

And <WG2532> In The <WG1722> Season <WG2540> He Sent <WG649> To <WG4314> The <WG3588> Husbandmen <WG1092> A Bondman, <WG1401> That <WG2443> From <WG575> The <WG3588> Fruit <WG2590> Of The <WG3588> Vineyard <WG290> They Might Give <WG1325> To Him; <WG846> <WG3588> But The <WG1161> Husbandmen <WG1092> Having Beat <WG1194> Him <WG846> Sent Him Away <WG1821> Empty. <WG2756>

And <WG2532> He Added <WG4369> To Send <WG3992> Another <WG2087> Bondman; <WG1401> <WG3588> But They <WG1161> Also Him <WG2548> Having Beat <WG1194> And <WG2532> Dishonoured Him <WG818> Sent Him Away <WG1821> Empty. <WG2756>
And <WG2532> He Added <WG4369> To Send <WG3992> A Third; <WG5154> <WG3588> And They <WG1161> Also <WG2532> Him <WG5126> Having Wounded <WG5135> Cast Him Out. <WG1544>

<WG2036> And Said <WG1161> The <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> Of The <WG3588> Vineyard, <WG290> What <WG5101> Shall I Do? <WG4160> I Will Send <WG3992> <WG3588> <WG5207> My Son <WG3450> The <WG3588> Beloved; <WG27> Perhaps <WG2481> Him <WG5126> Having Seen <WG1492> They Will Respect. <WG1788>

<WG1492> But Having Seen <WG1161> Him <WG846> The <WG3588> Husbandmen <WG1092> Reasoned <WG1260> Among <WG4314>, Themselves, <WG1438> Saying, <WG3004> This <WG3778> Is <WG2076> The <WG3588> Heir; <WG2818> Come <WG1205> Let Us Kill <WG615> Him, <WG846> That <WG2443> Ours <WG2257> May Become <WG1096> The <WG3588> Inheritance. <WG2817>

And <WG2532> Having Cast Forth <WG1544> Him <WG846> Outside <WG1854> The <WG3588> Vineyard <WG290> They Killed Him. <WG615> What <WG5101> Therefore <WG3767> Will Do <WG4160> To Them <WG846> The <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> Of The <WG3588> Vineyard? <WG290>

He Will Come <WG2064> And <WG2532> Will Destroy <WG622> <WG3588> <WG1092> These Husbandmen, <WG5128> And <WG2532> Will Give <WG1325> The <WG3588> Vineyard <WG290> To Others. <WG243> <WG191> And Having Heard It <WG1161>, They Said, <WG2036> Not <WG3361> May It Be! <WG1096>

<WG3588> But He <WG1161> Looking At <WG1689> Them <WG846> Said, <WG2036> What <WG5101> Then <WG3767> Is <WG2076> That <WG3588> Has Been Written <WG1125> This, <WG5124> The Stone <WG3037> Which <WG3739> Rejected <WG593> They That <WG3588> Build, <WG3618> This <WG3778> <WG1096> Is Become <WG1519> Head <WG2776> Of The Corner? <WG1137>

Everyone <WG3956> That <WG3588> Falls <WG4098> ' On <WG1909> That <WG1565> <WG3588> Stone <WG3037> <WG4917> ' Will Be Broken, <WG1909> <WG3739> ' <WG1161> But On Whomsoever <WG302> It May Fall <WG4098> It Will Grind To Powder <WG3039> Him. <WG846>

And <WG2532> Sought <WG2212> The <WG3588> Chief Priests <WG749> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Scribes <WG1122> To Lay <WG1911> ' On <WG1909> Him <WG846> <WG3588> Hands <WG5495> <WG1722> In <WG846> <WG3588> That Hour, <WG5610> And <WG2532> They Feared <WG5399> The <WG3588> People; <WG2992> <WG1097> For They Knew <WG1063> That <WG3754> Against <WG4314> Them <WG846> <WG3588> <WG3850> This Parable <WG3778> He Speaks. <WG2036>

And <WG2532> Having Watched Him <WG3906> They Sent <WG649> Secret Agents, <WG1455> Feigning <WG5271> Themselves <WG1438> Righteous <WG1342> To Be, <WG1511> That <WG2443> They Might Take Hold <WG1949> Of Him <WG846> In Discourse, <WG3056> To <WG1519> The End <WG3588> To Deliver Up <WG3860> Him <WG846> To The <WG3588> Power <WG746> And <WG2532> To The <WG3588> Authority <WG1849> Of The <WG3588> Governor. <WG2232>

And <WG2532> They Questioned <WG1905> Him, <WG846> Saying, <WG3004> Teacher, <WG1320> We Know <WG1492> That <WG3754> Rightly <WG3723> Thou Sayest <WG3004> And <WG2532> Teachest, <WG1321> And <WG2532> <WG3756> Acceptest Not Any Man's <WG2983> Person, <WG4383> ' But <WG235> ' With <WG1909> Truth <WG225> The <WG3588> Way <WG3598> <WG3588> Of God <WG2316> Teachest : <WG1321>
Is It Lawful <WG1832> For Us <WG2254> To Caesar <WG2541> Tribute <WG5411> To Give <WG1325> Or <WG2228> Not? <WG3756>
<WG2657> But Perceiving <WG1161> Their <WG846> <WG3588> Craftiness <WG3834> He Said <WG2036> To <WG4314> Them, <WG846> Why <WG5101> Me <WG3165> Do Ye Tempt? <WG3985>
Show <WG1925> Me <WG3427> A Denarius : <WG1220> Whose <WG5101> Has It <WG2192> Image <WG1504> And <WG2532> Inscription? <WG1923> <WG611> And Answering <WG1161>, They Said, <WG2036> Caesar's. <WG2541>

<WG3588> And He <WG1161> Said <WG2036>, To Them, <WG846> Render <WG591> Therefore <WG5106> The Things <WG3588> Of Caesar <WG2541> To Caesar, <WG2541> And <WG2532> The Things <WG3588> <WG3588> Of God <WG2316> <WG3588> To God. <WG2316>

And <WG2532> <WG3756> They Were Not Able <WG2480> <WG1949> To Take Hold <WG846> Of His Speech <WG4487> Before <WG1726> The <WG3588> People; <WG2992> And <WG2532> Wondering <WG2296> At <WG1909> <WG3588> <WG612> His Answer <WG846> They Were Silent. <WG4601>

<WG4334> And Having Come To Him <WG1161> Some <WG5100> Of The <WG3588> Sadducees, <WG4523> Who <WG3588> Deny <WG483> <WG386> A Resurrection <WG3361> There Is, <WG1511> They Questioned <WG1905> Him, <WG846>

Saying, <WG3004> Teacher, <WG1320> Moses <WG3475> Wrote <WG1125> To Us, <WG2254> If <WG1437> Anyone's <WG5100> Brother <WG80> Should Die <WG599> Having <WG2192> A Wife, <WG1135> And <WG2532> He <WG3778> Childless <WG815> Should Die, <WG599> That <WG2443> Should Take <WG2983> <WG3588> <WG80> His Brother <WG846> The <WG3588> Wife <WG1135> And <WG2532> Should Raise Up <WG1817> Seed <WG4690> <WG3588> <WG80> To His Brother. <WG846>
Seven <WG2033> Then <WG3767> Brethren <WG80> There Were, <WG2258> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> First <WG4413> Having Taken <WG2983> A Wife <WG1135> Died <WG599> Childless; <WG815>
And <WG2532> Took <WG2983> The <WG3588> Second <WG1208> The <WG3588>, Woman, <WG1135> And <WG2532> He <WG3778> Died <WG599> Childless; <WG815>

And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Third <WG5154> Took <WG2983> Her; <WG846> <WG5615> And Likewise <WG1161> Also <WG2532> The <WG3588> Seven <WG2033> <WG3756> Did Not Leave <WG2641> Children, <WG5043> And <WG2532> Died; <WG599>
Last <WG5305> And <WG1161> Of All <WG3956> Died <WG599> Also <WG2532> The <WG3588> Woman. <WG1135>

<WG1722> <WG3588> Therefore In The <WG3767> Resurrection <WG386> Of Which <WG5101> Of Them <WG846> Does She Become <WG1096> Wife? <WG1135> <WG3588> For The <WG1063> Seven <WG2033> Had <WG2192> Her <WG846> As Wife. <WG1135>

And <WG2532> Answering <WG611> Said <WG2036> To Them <WG846> <WG3588> Jesus, <WG2424> The <WG3588> Sons <WG5207> <WG3588> <WG165> Of This Age <WG5127> Marry <WG1060> And <WG2532>, Are Given In Marriage; <WG1548>

<WG3588> But Those <WG1161> Accounted Worthy <WG2661> <WG3588> <WG165> That Age <WG1565> To Obtain <WG5177> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Resurrection <WG386> Which Is <WG3588> From Among The <WG1537> Dead <WG3498> Neither <WG3777> Marry <WG1060> Nor <WG3777> Are Given In Marriage; <WG1548>

Neither <WG3777> For <WG1063> Die <WG599> Any More <WG2089> They Can; <WG1410> <WG2465> For Equal To Angels <WG1063> They Are, <WG1526> And <WG2532> Sons <WG5207> Are <WG1526> <WG3588> Of God, <WG2316> Of The <WG3588> Resurrection <WG386> Sons <WG5207> Being. <WG5607>

<WG3754> But That <WG1161> Are Raised <WG1453> The <WG3588> Dead, <WG3498> Even <WG2532> Moses <WG3475> Shewed In The Part <WG3377> On <WG1909> The <WG3588> Bush, <WG942> When <WG5613> He Called The <WG3004> Lord <WG2962> The <WG3588> God <WG2316> Of Abraham <WG11> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> God <WG2316> Of Isaac <WG2464> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> God <WG2316> Of Jacob; <WG2384>
<WG2316> But God <WG1161> <WG3756> He Is Not <WG2076> Of The Dead, <WG3498> But <WG235> Of The Living; <WG2198> <WG3956> For All <WG1063> For Him <WG846> Live. <WG2198>
Answering <WG611> And <WG1161> Some <WG5100> Of The <WG3588> Scribes <WG1122>, Said, <WG2036> Teacher, <WG1320> Well <WG2573> Thou Hast Spoken. <WG2036>
Not Any More <WG3765> And <WG1161> Did They Dare <WG5111> To Ask <WG1905> Him <WG846> Anything. (lit. Nothing.) <WG3762>

David <WG1138> Therefore <WG3767> Lord <WG2962> Him <WG846> Calls, <WG2564> And <WG2532> How <WG4459> <WG5207> His Son <WG846> Is He? <WG2076>
<WG191> And As Were Listening <WG1161> All <WG3956> The <WG3588> People <WG2992> He Said <WG2036> <WG3588> To Disciples <WG3101> His, <WG846>

Beware <WG4337> Of <WG575> The <WG3588> Scribes <WG1122> Who <WG3588> Like <WG2309> To Walk <WG4043> In <WG1722> Robes, <WG4749> And <WG2532> Love <WG5368> Salutations <WG783> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Market Places <WG58> And <WG2532> First Seats <WG4410> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Synagogues <WG4864> And <WG2532> First Places <WG4411> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Suppers; <WG1173>
